txt.en: Your efforts have done much already to purge Moria of the vile dragonets, but to eliminate yet more would be a relief beyond compare. No Dragon, no matter its size or shape, should be permitted to defile the great halls of the dwarves.
Of all the evils in Middle-earth, those of Dragon-kind are perhaps the most wholly cruel; however, these miniscule monsters seem hardly worth the effort to destroy them.
